alert.note: Alert for Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 17 at 6:35PM EDT until May 17 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BREVARD COUNTY... At 634 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Merritt Island, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Merritt Island, Cape Canaveral, Port Canaveral and Jetty Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
